about_the_game:
Shift that freight in a hurry without incurring disaster in this physics simulation action RPG. Pauly is an over-the-road trucker sucked into the world of the longshore industry. Learn to drive some of the oddest vehicles on the planet as you snatch up tons of goods destined for faraway countries. Keep that vertigo in check as you work from a bird's nest ten meters directly above your fellows. And it's going to take a little digging to solve the mystery of your overly friendly but strangely elusive cargo operations manager, the Stevedore.

FREE DEMO EDITION


For this special Demo Version of Stevedore 2024, there is no feature to save or load your progress. Pauly gains dubiously authorized access to the Straddle Crane and meets a small number of the Quay's odd crew.

In the full version due out this summer, the elusive stevedore will show Pauly how to operate more and more complicated cranes, avoid OSH+T violations, fend off disasters, and even travel through time in his quest to learn everything he can about the ultimate crane game, unless they catch him first.
